quizzer.api.views module

quizzer.api.views.handle_game_activity(request)[source]

stores the user game activity in gamehistory table

Parameters:

request (post request) – gets user game activity in json format

Returns:

if record is saved returns true else return false

Return type:

True or False

quizzer.api.views.level(request)[source]

made a hello world program to test the initial setup of the django project

Parameters:

request (request) – receives request parameter

Returns:

returns hello as httpresponse

Return type:

httpresponse

quizzer.api.views.testlevel(request)[source]

gets post request from frontend with game data made for testing

Parameters:

request (user , level , correct, active , totalquestions) – gets these from the post request

Returns:

maps all the the provided data from post request into json formate and returns it

Return type:

json data
